video.title: Handsome Siblings
video.synopsis: Clashing martial arts twins face relentless villains, thorny romance and brotherly rivalry as their troubled pasts catch up to them.

episodes.synopsis: Twelve Zodiac bandits ambush martial artist Jiang Feng and his lover, Hua Yuenu, a palace maid who gives birth to their twin sons.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Legendary swordsman Yan Nantian seeks the man responsible for Jiang Feng's demise and arrives at Wicked Canyon with one of the twins.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Jiang Xiaoyu leaves Wicked Canyon to unearth the mystery behind his father's death. Hua Wuque sets out to kill Xiaoyu on Yaoyue's orders.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Wuque faces a clever conspirator on the road. Xiaoyu encounters Tie Xinnan, a mysterious martial artist pursued by bandits.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Tie Xinlan asks Xiaoyu to accompany her on a quest. Amid efforts to find Xiaoyu, Wuque accepts the help of a man with an unexpected plan.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Xiaoyu and Xinlan outwit Zhang Jing by disguising themselves. Wuque becomes caught between two sparring sects.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Wuque attempts to broker a deal to secure Qin Ziling and Feng Baiyu's union, but the plan ends in tragedy.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Xiaoyu and Xinlan confront a bandit and wind up at the Murong residence, where a surprise visitor appears.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Murong Jiu vows revenge against Xiaoyu for disrupting her Rock Altering Divine Skill training. Wuque comes to Xinlan's aid.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: After crossing paths with Wuque at Mount Emei, Xiaoyu falls prey to a Twelve Zodiac ruse and comes across other treasure seekers.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Wuque makes a shocking discovery and prepares to fulfill his promise to Yaoyue, but Xinlan is determined to stand in the way.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Xiaoyu agrees to help a stranger and becomes trapped in a peculiar underground palace, where he meets Jiang Yulang, a servant with a hidden agenda.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: While escaping from Xiao Mimi's clutches, Xiaoyu and Yulang discover a martial arts manual. Wuque meets two figures who can shed light on his past.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Wuque vows to help Xinlan seek the truth about her father, Tie Zhan, the Raging Lion. Xiaoyu challenges Xuanyuan Sanguang in a daring gamble.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Failing to kill Xiaoyu after repeated attempts, Yulang arrives at his hometown, chained to his pesky companion. Xuanyuan Sanguang saves Xiaoyu's life.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: The deceitful Jiang Biehe offers to take Xiaoyu under his wing. At the Jiang residence, a skeptical Xiaoyu uncovers a secret.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: While on the run, Xiaoyu refines his martial arts skills and works as a cook — and soon stumbles into a conspiracy involving Yulang and Tie Wushuang.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: After discovering Yulang's ties to the Double Lion Armed Escort, Xiaoyu encounters Duan San, the daughter of prominent merchant Duan Hefei.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: At the Duan residence, Jiang Biehe and Wuque corner Xiaoyu. Xinlan becomes embroiled in a conspiracy against Tie Wushuang.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Donning a disguise, Xiaoyu tricks Tie Wushuang's conspirators and reveals Jiang Yulang's sinister scheme, but Jiang Biehe remains one step ahead.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Xiaoyu's rescuers help him ward off Jiang Biehe. Wuque's suspicion of Xiaoyu causes a rift with Xinlan.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Xiaoyu devises a scheme to help free Murong Jiu from the Wan Flower House. Xinlan confronts a man with an unexpected link to her past.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: As Tie Zhan's life hangs by a thread, Wuque begins to suspect Jiang Biehe. Zhang Jing and Xiaoyu cross paths again.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: After convincing Black Spider to help him expose Jiang Biehe, Xiaoyu comes across an item that would prove Jiang Biehe's guilt to Wuque.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Jiang Biehe finds Murong Jiu and implicates Xiaoyu for conspiring against him. Xiaoyu's Wicked Canyon friends pay him a visit.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: The tables turn on the Ten Great Villains when Yan Nantian's condition improves. Jiang Biehe and Yulang plot to kill Tie Zhan.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Wuque and Xiaoyu team up to pull down Jiang Biehe's mask. Xiaoyu asks Yan Nantian to spare Wuque's life.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: News of Wuque and Xiaoyu's friendship reaches Yihua Palace. Yan Nantian encounters Jiang Biehe, who tricks him into making a promise he'll regret.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: A man claiming to be Wei Wuya orders Yulang to find Murong Jiu. Repulsed by the actions of the masked woman, Xiaoyu draws up an escape plan.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Wuque helps Yan Nantian rein in Wei Mayi, Yulang challenges Xuanyuan Sanguang in a bet, and Xiaoyu confronts Wei Wuya's disciples.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Yulang follows Tie Pinggu to her residence. The Ouyang brothers tell Xiaoyu about a treasure linked to his past.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Yan Nantian falls prey to Yulang's dangerous scheme. Xiaoyu embarks on a treacherous quest to find and confront Wei Wuya.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Jiang Biehe makes Wei Wuya an offer to defeat Yaoyue together. Wuque infuriates Yaoyue by begging her to spare Xinlan's life.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Xiaoyu works out a ruse to escape captivity. Xinlan faces off against Yulang and falls into a trap — along with Wuque.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Murong Jiu recovers her memory. After pushing Xinlan away, Wuque encounters Su Ying, who has a hidden agenda.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Wei Mayi kidnaps Xiaoyu and asks Su Ying to show him the Yihua Jade Swapping Palm. Xiaoyu presses Yulang for information on Wuque's whereabouts.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Yulang promises he’ll hand over Wuque if Xiaoyu ingests a poison pill. Su Ying saves Xinlan's life.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Yaoyue releases Tie Pinggu and orders Xiaoyu to fulfill his end of the bargain — to fight and kill Wuque.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Wuque overhears Jiang Biehe's plan to kill Xiaoyu at Wuya Palace. The reason behind Wei Wuya's vendetta against Yaoyue comes to light.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Yan Nantian settles scores with Jiang Biehe, Tie Pinggu exacts revenge on Yulang, and Wei Wuya traps Xiaoyu, Lianxing and Yaoyue underground.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Xiaoyu, Lianxing and Yaoyue outwit Wei Wuya, who has one last maneuver. The Ten Great Villains pay a visit to Murong Jiu and Black Spider's wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: After a tearful reunion with Xiaoyu, Yan Nantian reveals Jiang Biehe's true identity. Tie Pinggu finds her father.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: As Xiaoyu scrambles to find a way out of his life-or-death predicament, Su Ying decides to intervene on his behalf.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Lianxing's attempt to change Yaoyue's mind flounders. Yaoyue reveals her sinister plan, but soon learns that ruthlessness is no match for wit.
episodes.title: Episode 44
